prompt:
Please create a list of 5 ideas for types of synthetic tabular data, with descriptions for the data they would contain, and what they might be useful for. Each dataset should be at least somewhat related to Star Wars.

Each item in the list should follow this format:
* [Name of the dataset] Data: This dataset would contain [description for the data it contains]. It could be used to [what it might be useful for].
response_text:
1. Star Wars Character Data: This dataset would contain a comprehensive list of all the characters featured in the Star Wars universe, with information such as their name, species, homeworld, and any other relevant details. It could be used to quickly reference information about any character within the franchise. 
2. Star Wars Species Data: This dataset would contain detailed information on all the various species found throughout the Star Wars universe, including their physical characteristics, home planets, and even any unique abilities they might possess. It could be used to quickly research and compare different species in the franchise.
3. Star Wars Planet Data: This dataset would contain comprehensive records of all the planets featured in Star Wars, including their size, atmosphere, population, and any other notable features. It could be used to get a better understanding of the different worlds featured in the series.
4. Star Wars Technology Data: This dataset would contain detailed records of the various technologies featured in the Star Wars universe, including descriptions of their purpose and how they work. It could be used to quickly understand the capabilities of different types of technology within the franchise.
5. Star Wars Ship Data: This dataset would contain an inventory of all the ships featured in the Star Wars universe, including their make and model, armaments, crew capacity, and any other relevant details. It could be used to quickly look up information about different ships within the series.

dataset_ideas.about: a comprehensive list of all the characters featured in the Star Wars universe, with information such as their name, species, homeworld, and any other relevant details
dataset_ideas.use_cases: quickly reference information about any character within the franchise
